modName: A Simple Little Clean Up - Breezehome
summary: ﻿I was tired of how the Breezehome was laid out.  No Enchanting Table, no mannequin for armor, crates under the stair well, items not placed correctly, lack of light upstairs, and so on.  This is my attempt at cleaning everything up and adding items in a lore friendly way that still makes the Breezehome keep its small and cozy feel.
descriptionHtml:
I was tired of how the Breezehome was laid out.  No Enchanting Table, no mannequin for armor, crates under the stair well, items not placed correctly, lack of light upstairs, and so on.  This is my attempt at cleaning everything up and adding items in a lore friendly way that still makes the Breezehome keep its small and cozy feel. 

You should also try out [size=3][font=Times New Roman] [/font][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57898/?][color=#6d9eeb][b][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Breezehome Front Porch - A Simple Little Add-On[/size][/font][/b][/color][/url].  It adds a front porch to the Breezehome.  There are also other links to make the Breezehome and Whiterun in general look better.

[b][i][u]Info:[/u][/i][/b]
I changed many things (mostly clutter). 

The most notable changes are...
- Moved the Potions Table under the stairs.
- Added an Enchanting Table to where the Potions Table used to be.
- Added a mannequin to show off your armor.
- Added a few more weapon racks to show off your cool weapons.
- Added a safe. 
- Added a shelf to the Housecarl's room.
- I moved a few things around to make it look more realistic, less cluttered, and less like a storage unit. 
- I also added some more decorations so it feels more like a home.
- A few bug fixes.
- A LOT MORE LITTLE TWEAKS!!!

The layout of the Breezehome did not change except for the positions of the Potions Table and some storage crates. 

[color=#ffff00]You will [u]NOT[/u] lose anything that you have in storage in the Breezehome.  [/color] 

[u][i][b]Requirements:[/b][/i][/u]
- Latest version of Skyrim.

[u][i][b]Installation:[/b][/i][/u] 
Use nexus or manually drop the file into your "Data" folder.

[b][i][u]Compatibility:[/u][/i][/b] 
- Compatible with all mods that do not affect the interior of the Breezehome. 
[b] [/b]
[u][i][b]Known Issue(s):[/b][/i][/u]
- There are no known issues with this mod.

[b][i][u]Uninstallation:[/u][/i][/b]
Simply remove the mod from the data folder or uninstall with nexus and everything will go back to the way it was.

[size=1][b][i][u]First Use:
[/u][/i][/b]When you first use this mod, there is a CHANCE you will find some stuff just lying on the ground.  This just means that your character moved the item and the game rendered another where it was supposed to be.  If this happens, just pick them up and sell them or do whatever you want with them.  [u]It will NOT happen again[/u].[/size]


[font=Times New Roman][size=3][color=#6aa84f][font=Trebuchet MS]And, as always, thank you for looking/downloading...  If you like my work, please remember to check out some of my other mods :)[/font]
[/color]﻿ ﻿- [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57535/?][b][size=3]A Simple Little Clean Up - Whiterun Stores[/size][/b][/url][size=3]
﻿- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57898/?][color=#6d9eeb][b]Breezehome Front Porch - A Simple Little Add-On[/b][/color][/url]
﻿﻿ ﻿- [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57490/?][b][size=3]Greybeard's Robe Unlocker[/size][/b][/url]
[b][size=3]﻿ ﻿- [/size][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57642/?][b][size=3]Executioner's Robe Unlocker and Headsman's Axe Modifier[/size][/b][/url][/font]
